reaction.name: Chilling Mist (3/Day)
entries: When the glacius knight takes damage from an attack, it can surround itself with an icy mist and teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Savage Attacker (1/Turn)
entries: When the half-dragon revenant rolls damage for a melee weapon attack, they can reroll the weapon's damage dice and use either total.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The half-dragon revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the half-dragon revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the half-dragon revenant's next turn. The half-dragon revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: When the half-dragon revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points.
While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The half-dragon revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Vengeful Tracker
entries: The half-dragon revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the halfdragon revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the half-dragon revenant dies, the half-dragon revenant knows.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-dragon revenant makes two greataxe attacks or one attack with its breath weapon.

action.name: Greateaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon revenant exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Vengeful Glare
entries: The half-dragon revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the half-dragon revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the half-dragon revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is {@condition frightened} of the half-dragon revenant for 1 minute. The {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the half-dragon revenant, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The haunted's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The haunted can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: One with the Dead
entries: An undead creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw to target the haunted directly with an attack or a harmful spell. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Commune with Spirits
entries: The haunted is able to speak with a spirit belonging to a humanoid creature that has died in the last 24 hours.

trait.name: Obscure
entries: As a bonus action, the haunted can summon or dismiss spirits that swirl about its body.
While active, a creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against the haunted.

action.name: Assault the Living
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}39 ({@damage 6d12}) necrotic damage. This has no effect on undead or constructs.

action.name: Grasping Spirits
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} for 1 minute (escape {@dc 18}) as spirits rise out of the ground and hold the creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hedge wizard's innate spellcasting ability is Constitution (spell save {@dc 13}).
The hedge wizard can innately cast the following spells:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hedge wizard is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Migrant Spellcaster
entries: After the hedge wizard casts a spell, it can use its bonus action to move up to half of its movement speed. This does not provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands..

action.name: Fungal Rot
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Treat Disease (3/Day)
entries: The hedge wizard can end a disease on a creature.

reaction.name: Feed on Death
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the hedge wizard drops to 0 hit points, the hedge wizard gains 5 ({@dice 1d10}) temporary hit points.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The infernal warrior's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The infernal warrior can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: The infernal warrior can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet.

trait.name: Fury of Hell
entries: The infernal warrior's weapon strikes deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included below).

trait.name: Suspicious Nature
entries: The infernal warrior has advantage on all Wisdom (Perception) checks made to identify and see through illusions as well as against being {@condition charmed}. The infernal warrior also has advantage on Charisma (Deception) saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The infernal warrior makes three glaive attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Hellfire Rebuke
entries: After the infernal warrior is hit with an attack that deals damage, it points its finger at the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ironstring bard is a 10th-level spellcasters. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The ironstring bard has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience:
entries: The ironstring bard has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Taunt (2/Day)
entries: The ironstring bard can use a bonus action on their turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the ironstring bard, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of The ironstring bard's next turn.

trait.name: Tavern Brawler
entries: When The ironstring bard hits a creature with an unarmed strike, mandolin, or an improvised weapon, it may use a bonus action to attempt to grapple the target.

action.name: Unarmed Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Mandolin
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Battering Charger
entries: If the man-at-arms moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee attack, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) weapon damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The man-at-arms has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rallying Leader
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the manat-arms gains 5 temporary hit points when it rolls initiative. The temporary hit points last for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The man-at-arms makes three melee attacks and uses Bulwark or Combat's Call if it is available.

action.name: Vicious Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5ft, one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the manat-arms scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Bulwark {@recharge 4}
entries: The man-at-arms takes a defensive stance behind it's broad shield. Until the start of its next turn, it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws and gains a +2 bonus to AC.

action.name: Combat's Call (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The man-at-arms and up to five allied creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear or see it gains 15 temporary hit points that last for 1 minute. While these hit points remain, the target has advantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

reaction.name: Retaliation
entries: If the man-at-arms is hit by an attack that deals damage, it can make an attack with its vicious battleaxe against its attacker if it is within range.

trait.name: Essence of the Hunt
entries: The marked hunter can take the bite attack, dash, disengage, or hide action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The marked hunter has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put them to sleep.

trait.name: Mark of the Hunt (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the marked hunter can choose a creature it can see within 90 feet and mystically mark it as a quarry.

For 24 hours or if the target drops to 0 hit points, the marked hunter deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage to the target whenever it hits the target with a ranged weapon attack, and the marked hunter has advantage on any Wisdom (Perception) or Wisdom (Survival) check it makes to find the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marked hunter makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow (Mark of the Hunt)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack:
{@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The martinet is a 4th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The martinet has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance:
entries: The martinet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The martinet makes two spear attacks or one spear attack and a shield slam.

action.name: Silvered Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Shield Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Shield Ally
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the martinet is attacked by a creature it can see, the martinet swaps places with the target creature, if able, and becomes the target of the attack instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The moonlit shadow's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The moonlit shadow can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the moonlit shadow can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The moonlit shadow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the moonlit shadow to sleep.

trait.name: One with the Night
entries: The moonlit shadow can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, to a distance of 120 feet. Additionally, the moonlit shadow is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on darkvision to see it in that darkness.

trait.name: Shadowstrike
entries: During the first round of combat, the moonlit shadow's movement speed increases by an additional 10 feet. If it attacks on that turn, it can make an additional attack with its dagger.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The moonlit shadow makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Umbral Touch (2/Day)
entries: The moonlit shadow can touch a creature and remove one of the following conditions: {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Bane of the Undead:
entries: The purifier's damage rolls always deal max damage against undead creatures.

trait.name: Blessing of the Blade
entries: The purifier can spend 1 hour to bless a melee weapon with the ability to overcome magical resistances to piercing, slashing and bludgeoning damage that lasts for 8 hours. The blessed weapon also deals an additional 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage to undead creatures.

trait.name: Inspiring Presence
entries: While the purifier is conscious, the purifier and all friendly creatures within 30 feet of the it gain a +5 bonus to saving throws.

trait.name: Turn Undead (1/Day)
entries: The purifier presents its holy symbol and speaks a prayer censuring the Undead.

Each Undead that can see or hear the purifier within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. If a creature fails its saving throw, it is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.
A creature that fails its saving throw by 5 or more is instantly destroyed if its Intelligence Ability Score is 8 or less.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The purifier makes three attacks with its blessed blade.

action.name: Blessed Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blessed Blade (against undead)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 32 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The pyromancer is an 11th-level spellcaster. The pyromancer's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The pyromancer has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the pyromancer is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Firewalker (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the pyromancer disappears in a burst of flame and reappears inside any flame it can see within 60 feet of it. The flame must be at least large enough to encompass the pyromancer's body.

trait.name: Hot-Blooded
entries: The pyromancer is immune to poison and disease.

action.name: Cantrip:
entries: Produce Flame. Ranged Spell Attack: {@hit 6} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Brave
entries: The rebel knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Symbolic Patron
entries: The rebel knight gains +2 to saving throws and ability checks that are aligned with their symbolic patron.

trait.name: Weapons Mastery
entries: The rebel knight is proficient with all martial melee and ranged weapons and has a preferred weapon, gaining {@hit 1} to hit and to damage for that weapon (included in the attack).

trait.name: Combat Awareness
entries: The rebel knight is always aware of the state of the battlefield, even before it has developed, gaining +2 to Perception and passive Perception.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rebel knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword (preferred weapon)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the rebel knight can utter a command or warning whenever a friendly creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw (including the knight's warhorse). Within 1 minute, the creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the rebel knight.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The rebel knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the rebel knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The red witch is an 9th-level spellcaster.
The blood sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The red witch has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blood Bind {@recharge}
entries: The red witch forces a creature to succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become bound to the red witch. While a creature is bound, the red witch can manipulate the creature's blood to force it to carry out the red witch's commands as a bonus action on its turns, including the one in which Blood Bind was used. A bound creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of their turns, freeing themselves on a success. A freed creature immediate takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage upon being freed.

action.name: Blood Seize (1/Day)
entries: The red witch selects up to 3 creatures that it can see within 30 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition paralyzed} until the end of their next turn as the witch halts their blood flow.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The retired red wizard is a 12th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The Retired Red Wizard has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
entries: When the retired red wizard casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, the retired red wizard can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell's level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it. (Applicable evocation spells are in bold italics above)

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

reaction.name: Deliberation
entries: When a creature that the retired red wizard can see within 60 feet of it casts a spell that requires concentration, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or the spell has no effect. The spell still uses a spell slot.

monster.name: Rune Weaver
languages: Common plus any two other languages (spoken)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The rune weaver is a 9th-level spellcaster. The rune weaver's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The rune weaver has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Astute Runecraft
entries: The rune weaver may cast rune-, glyph-, and sigil-based spells in half the usual time.

trait.name: Rune Magic
entries: The rune weaver may inscribe up to four objects with runes. Inscribing a rune is a ritual that takes five minutes. Runes fade after a long rest and must be re-inscribed. Objects may hold only one rune. Each rune may only be used on one object per long rest. If a creature has multiple items inscribed with runes, they choose which rune to use and may change their selection during a short rest.

action.name: Rune of Scorching
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft. , one target. {@h}36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

action.name: Rune of Dazing {@recharge 5}
entries: Ranged Spell Attack:

{@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. Target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sewer druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. The sewer druid's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The sewer druid has the following spells prepared:

action.name: Filthy Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The shadow mage is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The shadow mage has the following spells prepared.

trait.name: Shadow Weave
entries: While the shadow mage is in dim light or darkness, a creature has disadvantage on saving throws against illusion spells cast by the shadow mage. (Applicable illusion spells are in bold italics above)

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shadow Embrace {@recharge 5}
entries: The shadow mage targets up to 6 creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw of take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Inspirational Speech (1/Day)
entries: Taking 10 minutes, the shield sentinel gives a speech that elevates moral.

Any creatures of the shield sentinel's choosing that are within 30 feet of the it gain 11 ({@dice 2d10}) temporary hit points and have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} until they complete a long rest.

trait.name: Master of Shields
entries: While the shield sentinel is not {@condition incapacitated} and has a shield in its hand, the shield sentinel gains advantage on all Dexterity saving throws against spells and spell-like effects.

trait.name: Protector
entries: Attacks made against friendly creatures that are within 5 feet of the shield sentinel are made with disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shield sentinel makes three attacks: two with its longsword and one with its shield bash.
Longsword Melee Weapon Attack: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Safeguard the Vulnerable (3/Day)
entries: If a creature within 15 feet of the shield sentinel is targeted with an attack, the shield sentinel can give the creature a +5 bonus to its AC.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the dragon remains motionless, its hide is indistinguishable from an ordinary rock surface.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The dragon can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the dragon doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Magma Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon spews molten magma in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The area becomes difficult terrain and is unbearably hot for 1 minute. Any creature that ends its turn in the affected area takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hibernate
entries: When straddling a planar gateway to the Elemental Plane of Earth, the dragon falls into a magical sleep and may not be awoken by normal means. The portal closes in around the dragon and seals it in place inside an immobile, faintly shimmering barrier composed of magical force. This barrier prevents any matter from passing through it and blocks any spells cast into or out of it. The dragon will wake again only when hunger strikes ({@dice 1d6 x 100} years) or the need to purge its territory arises.

trait.name: Enrage
entries: In battle, the stormzerker fights with primal ferocity. Stormzerkers have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws. At the end of battle, a stormzerker takes a level of {@condition exhaustion} due to their extreme efforts.

trait.name: Storm Aura
entries: Stormzerkers emanate a stormy, magical aura while fighting. The aura extends 10 feet from the stormzerker in all directions, but not through total cover. Each round, as a bonus action, the stormzerker can designate one other creature it can see within the aura. That creature must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stormzerker makes three melee attacks: two with its battle axe and one with its shortsword.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The stormzerker exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide.
Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sunwitch is an 5th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The sunwitch knows the following spells:

trait.name: Radiant Hope
entries: The sunwitch has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Shadowbane
entries: The sunwitch counts as a source of bright light against creatures with the Sunlight Sensitivity and Light Sensitivity traits or other creatures that suffer disadvantage on attack rolls while in bright light. Additionally, allied creatures within 10 ft. of the sunwitch cannot have their Strength score magically reduced.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sunbolt (2/Day)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage and the sunwitch radiates bright light for 10 ft. and dim light for another 5 ft. until the start of its next turn.
This light counts as sunlight.

reaction.name: Illuminate
entries: If the sunwitch is {@condition grappled}, it can explodes in a flash of radiant energy. The grappling creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage and the sunwitch is no longer {@condition grappled}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sylvan druid is a 12th-level spellcaster.
Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The sylvan druid has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The sylvan druid has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the sylvan druid to sleep.

trait.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the sylvan druid shapechanges into a beast with a CR 1 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 2 hours. The sylvan druid reverts to its true form if it's beast form dies or falls {@condition unconscious}. The sylvan druid can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn. While in a new form, the sylvan druid retains its game statistics with the following exceptions: its AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions that the new form has but that it lacks.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The sylvan druid deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The sylvan druid can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Bag of Teeth (3/Day)
entries: They can as an action throw teeth from their pouch to cover a 10-foot square starting from a point the teeth collector can see within 30 feet of it. For the duration, these teeth turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or it falls {@condition prone} and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The teeth collectors can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

trait.name: Pointy Leather
entries: A creature that successfully grapples the teeth collector takes 3 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage at the end of each of its turns that the creature has the teeth collector {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The teeth collector makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Tooth Covered Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage and 4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Tile Shark
languages: Thieves' cant plus any three languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tile shark is a 3rd-level spellcaster.
The tile shark's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The tile shark has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the tile shark can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action, or to control a mage hand it has cast.

trait.name: Suppressive Fire
entries: As a bonus action, the tile shark can order its arcane hwach'a to fire a volley of fireworks.
As part of the same action, the tile shark can direct the arcane hwach'a to walk or climb up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The tile shark deals an extra 13 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the tile shark that isn't incapacitated and the tile shark doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tile shark makes two attacks with its returning dart.

action.name: Returning Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Summon Arcane Hwach'a
entries: The tile shark summons its magical fireworks launcher, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. The arcane hwach'a disappears if it is reduced to 0 hit points or after 10 minutes. If the mending spell is cast on it, the arcane hwach'a regains {@dice 2d6} hit points. The tile shark can dismiss it early as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The troll mystic is an 5th-level spellcaster. The troll mystic's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The troll mystic has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Keen Smell:
entries: The troll mystic has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll mystic regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll mystic takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll mystic's next turn. The troll mystic dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wayfarer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The wayfarer has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Flawless Pursuer
entries: The wayfarer can unerringly track a creature it has seen in the past 24 hours. While tracking a creature in this way alone, the wayfarer can move stealthily at a quick pace.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The wayfarer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Vicious Wounds
entries: The wayfarer deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits with a weapon attack (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wayfarer can use its Observer feature. It then makes two scimitar attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged weapon Attack: {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Observe
entries: The wayfarer makes a Wisdom (Perception) check. If the wayfarer is {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}, it can instead repeat one saving throw to end the effect.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wildwood virago's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The wildwood virago can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Adept Tree-Climber
entries: The wildwood virago has been climbing trees since she was a child. It can climb trees at its full speed and has advantage on Strength (Athletics) and Dexterity (Acrobatics) checks made to jump from one tree to another.

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the wildwood virago can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The wildwood virago has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the wildwood virago to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The wildwood virago knows the forest well. While in the forest, it has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight, hearing, or smell.

trait.name: Woodland Stealth
entries: The wildwood virago is so practiced and trained in the art of stealth in a forest terrain, it rolls Dexterity (Stealth) checks with advantage and cannot roll lower than a 10 on the dice.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wildwood virago makes two longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: As part of his pact with the primal powers of nature, the wildwood zealot is granted a number of innate spells. The wildwood zealot's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The wildwood zealot can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wildwood zealot is an 11th-level spellcaster. The wildwood zealot's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks).
The wildwood zealot has the following spells prepared:

trait.name: Change Shape (2/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the wildwood zealot shapechanges into a beast with a CR 1 or less, and can remain in this form for up to 2 hours. The wildwood zealot reverts to its true form if its beast form dies or falls {@condition unconscious}. The wildwood zealot can revert to its true form using a bonus action on its turn.

While in a new form, the wildwood druid retains its game statistics with the following exceptions: its AC, movement modes, Strength, and Dexterity are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any special senses, proficiencies, traits, actions, and reactions that the new form has but that it lacks.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The wildwood zealot has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the wildwood zealot to sleep.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit ({@hit 6} to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@dice 1d6 + 1} ) bludgeoning damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

reaction.name: Forest's Wrath
entries: After the wildwood zealot is hit with an attack that deals damage, it points its finger at the attacker. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) piercing damage as it is swarmed with biting tiny insects.

monster.name: Witchtaker
languages: Common plus any two other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The witchtaker is an 11th-level spellcaster. The witchtaker's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Eldritch Grasp:
entries: The Witchtaker uses their spellcasting modifier instead of Strength when initiating or maintaining a grapple. If the creature is {@condition unconscious}, the grapple attempt automatically succeeds and dragging the target does not halve the witchtaker's speed.
Taken Alive: When the witchtaker reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a spell, the witchtaker can choose to knock the creature out. The creature falls {@condition unconscious} and is stable.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The witchtaker uses Eldritch Blast three times or attacks with their pact rod twice and attempts to grapple a creature.

action.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Pact Rod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage.

action.name: Quick Circle (1/Day)
entries: The witchtaker casts {@spell teleportation circle} with a casting time of 1 action. If the witchtaker is within 5 feet of an {@condition unconscious} creature, the witchtaker can grapple that creature as a bonus action and drag it into the portal by spending 10 feet of movement (the portal remains open until the end of the witchtaker's next turn).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The woodland outrider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The woodland outrider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The woodland outrider has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the woodland outrider to sleep.

trait.name: Shroud of the Forest
entries: The woodland outrider has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while in forested terrain and can't be tracked magically unless it chooses to be.

trait.name: Timberland Sniper
entries: The woodland outrider deals maximum damage on successful attacks if it has advantage on the attack.

trait.name: Woodland Senses
entries: The woodland outrider has advantage on Intelligence (Nature) and Wisdom (Perception) checks while within forested terrain. In urban settings, the woodland outrider makes Intelligence (Nature) and Wisdom (Perception) checks with disadvantage.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. A target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or it takes an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage and is {@condition paralyzed} until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Tree Stride {@recharge}
entries: The woodland outrider enters into a tree and moves from inside it to inside another tree of the same kind within 100 feet. It appears in a spot within 5 feet of the destination tree and may make an attack with its longbow upon leaving the destination tree.

reaction.name: Shadowy Dodge
entries: The woodland outrider can dodge in unforeseen ways while it is in a forested terrain. When a creature makes an attack roll against the woodland outrider and doesn't have advantage on the roll, the woodland outrider can impose disadvantage on the attack.

trait.name: Rift Walker:
entries: As a bonus action, the worldly riftcaller can open two 5-foot wide and 10-foot tall portals at two points it can see within 120 feet of it. These portals are linked. A creature can use 10 feet of its movement speed to enter one portal and emerge from the other. The worldly riftcaller can close the portals as an action on its turn. The worldly riftcaller must focus on keeping the portals open, as if it were concentrating on a spell.
Unstable Arcanum: If the worldly riftcaller is reduced to 0 hit points and has not yet used its Sunder action, it automatically activates.
Planeswalker: The worldly riftcaller is able to spend 1 minute to cast the planeshift spell on itself. No other creatures can join them as part of the spell.

action.name: Flintlock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one targets. {@h}32 ({@damage 6d8 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Vortex
entries: The worldly riftcaller creates a singular point of chaotic energy that it can see within 120 feet of it that lasts for 1 minute. Any creature that starts its turn within a 10-foot sphere of this point suffers 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage. The worldly riftcaller can have up to three vortexes active at a time.

action.name: Summon Elemental (1/Day)
entries: The worldly riftcaller summons an random elemental. Roll a {@dice d4}, with the corresponding score representing the type of elemental: 1-air, 2-fire, 3-earth, 4-water. The summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the worldly riftcaller and acts as its ally. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or the worldly riftcaller dies, or until the worldly riftcaller dismisses it as an action.

action.name: Sunder (1/Day)
entries: The worldly riftcaller causes devastation on a massive scale. Any creature, object and structure within 60 feet of the worldly riftcaller must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 110 ({@damage 20d10}) force damage on a failed save, or half on a successful one. The worldly riftcaller is also affected by its Sunder ability.

item.name: Auspex's Staff
entries: When you strike a creature with this staff, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (save DC 15) or suffer disadvantage on any attack it makes before the end of its next turn.

item.name: Court Mage's Shawl
entries: When you wear this shawl, you are able cast spells of 3rdlevel or lower without the spell's verbal or somantic components.

item.name: Herbal Healing Poultice
entries: As an action, a creature can apply this herb-soaked cloth to a wound to regain {@dice 1d4} hit points.

item.name: Herbal Energy Mushroom
entries: As an action, you can swallow this foul-tasting mushroom to gain {@dice 2d4} temporary hit points which last for 1 hour. At the end of the duration, you gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

item.name: Wand of Deliberation
entries: When a creature that you can see within 60 feet of you casts a spell that requires concentration, you can use your reaction to have the creature make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the spell has no effect. The creature losses the spell slot.

item.name: Valiant Safeguard
entries: This shield has 3 charges, which recharge a dawn. While you are holding it, you can speak its command word as a reaction to cause the shield to create a projection of itself to protect a creature that you can see within 15 feet of you that is being attacked. The creature adds a +5 bonus to its AC for the triggering attack, then the projection fades.

item.name: Ally's Reflection
entries: This magic shield is crafted from a single sheet of platinum and embroidered with silver and gold.

entries.name: Ally's
entries: While wielding this magic shield, you gain a +1 bonus to AC for every ally within 5 feet of you that isn't {@condition incapacitated} (up to a maximum of +2).

entries.name: Reflection
entries: When a creature misses you with a weapon attack while you are wielding this magic shield, you can choose to reflect the attack back on the attacker. The creature must make a new attack roll for the attack against its own AC. On a hit, the creature takes damage and suffers other effects of the attack as normal. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Black Blade
entries: The blade of this magic battleaxe is so dark it seems to absorb light rather than reflect it.

entries.name: Master
entries: This magical battleaxe contains a transmuted quasit. While attuned to the weapon, you can use an action to speak the battleaxe's command word and throw it up into the air. The battleaxe becomes a quasit, that is under your control and acts on its own initiative count.

The creature obeys any verbal commands that you issue to it (no action required by you). The creature reverts back to the weapon after if it's reduced to 0 hit points, or if you use a bonus action to end the transformation. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.

item.name: Commander's Hope
entries: This magic sword is of excellent make, bearing faintly glowing runes on its adamantine blade. You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic sword.

entries.name: Commander's
entries: When another creature within 30 feet that can hear and see you makes an attack roll while you are holding this magic sword, you can use your reaction to give that creature advantage on its roll.

entries.name: Hope
entries: This magic sword has 3 charges. While you carry it, you can use an action and expend 1 or more of its charges to cast {@spell aid}. For 1 charge, you cast the 2nd-level version of the spell. You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend. You can also use an action and expend 2 of its charges to cast {@spell beacon of hope}. The sword regains all expended charges daily at dawn.

item.name: Soldier's Luck
entries: While clearly well-made, these otherwise unremarkable boots hide the great power contained within.

entries.name: Soldier's
entries: While wearing these magic boots, you have advantage on death saving throws and saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Luck
entries: While wearing these magic boots, you can call on its luck (no action required) to reroll one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you dislike. You must use the second roll. Once used, this property can't be used again until the next dawn.
